title: Web3 Convention
subtitle: Melbourne, May 2024
description: Web3 Convention is an event to explore the future of Web 2.0 and Web 3.0 and will host in the best convention centre in Australia.  The convention aims to bridge the gap between Web2 and Web3 communities.

title: Web3 Hackathon
subtitle: Australia, May25-July23 2023
description: Web3 Hackathon is Australia most premier annual hackathon event catered to a global audience to support the next generation of Web3 innovation and products.

title: Web3 Uni Hackathon
subtitle: Australia, Mar22-May25 2023
description: As part of Web3 Convention, W3C will host a web3 hackathon for students from April 15th to July 23rd, 2023 with over $100k in grants and prizes.
